content.rendered:
The Incopro team is expanding rapidly and we are looking for talented individuals to join us

Looking for a new challenge in your career? Want to move into a fast-paced environment working on some of the most cutting-edge technology in a dynamic, innovative company?

Who we are

Incopro is an online IP and brand protection software provider that arms brand owners with actionable intelligence to combat online and offline intellectual property and copyright infringements. Our flagship product, Talisman, combines Big Data and Machine Learning technology with legal and law enforcement expertise to gather and analyse relevant data for our clients. We are working with some of the largest brands around the world in multiple verticals.

We recently received a USD$21M investment from the venture capitalist firm Highland Europe. As part of this investment we are looking to invest in and grow our highly skilled team, with a specific focus on Software Developers. Incopro is also expanding around the world as our operations continue to grow and we now have offices in London, Wales, Shanghai, New York and Boise.

Our team

Our company is filling a real need in the marketplace on an issue that is of huge significance to society. The internet has created endless opportunities but unchecked has the potential to cause great damage. Incopro is full of passionate and talented professionals dedicated to preventing this.

At the core of this are our Software Developers, it is the technology they create that enables us to bring the fight to counterfeiters & IP infringers and ensure we stay ahead of the competition. They describe their work as ‘sexy tech’, and the software language they code in is Python. Their core product is a Django application with a complex backend based around a mixture of managed servers and cloud services.

Company culture

Incopro places a lot of importance on company culture and we work hard to ensure our offices are an open, friendly and collaborative environment. We have people from a wide range of diverse backgrounds (proficiency in over 45 languages) and this means a lot of differing points of view, as well as local knowledge from around the world.

We place a large emphasis on work-life balance, and whilst the team works hard, there are also daily foosball tournaments, weekly team drinks and regular events throughout the year.

Our values

Innovation, creativity, respect and drive are at the heart of who we are, and these are values that we look for in everyone who joins our team. If this sounds like you, then have a look at our careers page and see what roles we have open, or for further information about Incopro look through our website.

excerpt.rendered: If you thrive in an innovative and creative environment, we would love for you to join our dynamic team
